title: A Golden Civilization and The Map of Mindfulness
description: George Kinder invites readers to imagine a thousand generations have passed and humanity has at last accomplished a Golden Civilization. What does it look like? Who are we there? Of all our systems and structures currently in place which of them got us there? And which of them were irretrievably heading in the wrong direction? He challenges readers to immediately abandon habits, structures, and systems that wonâ€™t take us to a Golden Civilization and adopt those that will.
author: George Kinder
